tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Dr. Bharathi Rajanna as i was struggling to get pregnant.
After 10 years of marriage it is very difficult to convince both ourselves and society for not having child, and we were very much exhausted by taking too many medicines. Then one of our fiend gave the reference of Dr. Bharathi Rajanna and we visited to her and in our first meeting only i told her that madam i want to go to IVF as i cant wait more to have a baby, she was too patient and listed our problems calmly and asked me to do some blood tests and come back after we went to her with report she explained me the problems in a very simpler manner which i can understand asked me to reduce my weight once and then if that also did not work out then we will go for next level is what she told(She rejected to go for IVF, which shows her empathy/kindness/genuineness). And with her constant help, support and proper guidance i conceived naturally and delivered safely for a girl baby.
Thank you soo much madam, with out your support my pregnancy would have been a nightmare.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: What seemed like a distant dream for me and my husband was made a reality by Dr. Bharathi Rajanna. When our initial efforts of conceiving a child met with no success, disappointment was writ large on our faces. In an opportune moment, a family friend advised us to consult Dr. Bharathi Rajanna. She did study my case comprehensively and opined that there isn't a reason to worry and advised that I turn towards a healthier lifestyle. She said that I need transformation rather than treatment. As the days passed by, I felt confident and had positive vibes. Although it took over 8 months, I conceived naturally and that too with twins. :) Throughout my pregnancy, the doctor guided me like a mother and never did I face any issues whatsoever. I'm indebted to her forever. Shortly after my twin daughters turned two, I conceived again with a singleton. With the pandemic raging all across, I was obviously worried about medical management during pregnancy. The doctor was always available over call and I felt assured throughout. I delivered a baby boy towards the end of third trimester and there was no limit to the joy of our family. None of this would be possible without the noble efforts of the doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am so grateful to Doctor Bharathi and very impressed with how she grasp and understood my problem and treated me accodingly. I was suffering from acne for a long time (2 years). Visited a lot of Dermatologist wasted a lot of time and money. None of them were helpful. I had for a long time guessed that my acne was hormonal and the template soap and ointment the dermatologist prescribe was not going to help me. Dr. Bharathi listened to me understood my issues. Directed me to take hormonal tests to check everything. She prescribed three tablet, one to treat hormone, one supplement with various nutrients and one with anti biotic and pro biotic. Slowly but surely my acne started healing. it did not dry out or destroyed my skin. it just healed slowly from inside. Earlier my face was filled with huge red painful cystic acne. It was so bad. Now its healed. just a few marks and tiny one or white heads. It is still healing. I am grateful to her and am completely in satisfied with her diagnosis and treatment. I only wish i had met her sooner. thank you doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had a terrible experience with the doctor. The doctor was extremely arrogant, unprofessional and outright rude. She didn't maintain patient privacy and commented on my personal issues in front of another patient violating my privacy. I highly am against anybody visiting her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I visited Bharathi mam with hormonal imbalance and ovarian problems.

Having complications with my ovary and PCOD problems, it was very difficult for getting pregnant, Bharathi mam was very kind and patient to explain me the complications and the solutions ahead. With close monitoring of my health and her motherly care helped me to conceive naturally.

I still remember the day when i had problems in my second trimester, where she called me on a late night to understand if i am OK and facing any issues. Being so experienced and having lot of patients, I cannot assume if anybody would have taken these kind of care for their patients. She treats each of their patients with great care.

I am blessed with a kid now and this would have not been possible without Bharathi mam's treatment and care.

She is really a god gift for many of patients like me and has helped to bring smile on lot of people's faces.

Our entire family is thankful to Bharathi mam for her care and helping me to get rid of health issues. We always remember her and thank her in our hearts everyday.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
She is a very friendly Dr. 
I had visited three Dr and lost hope of becoming pregnant normally.. Then went to bharathi mam. Explained our problem, she studied our complete previous reports.
Just asked myself n my husband to take the reports which is only necessary and not everything all over again. 

She explain the problem so well and also told us how long will it take for treatment n pregnancy.. she just asked me to be patient and I just followed what she said.  

I had a complicated pregnancy but she was always there for us just a call away. 

Now we are happy n proud parents of a two and half year boy baby. **** ****** *** ** *** **** ** ** **** **** **** 

Thank u so so much mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Bharathi Rajanna is very friendly doctor having the quality of caring hands. I started visiting the doctor 6 years back for my first baby. After suffering from few pregnancy complications I came to know this doctor. I went to consult her for second opinion, but in my first visit I was impressed with her suggestions and healthy lifestyle during pregnancy. In every visit I learned few new things from the doctor. She inspire with her talk. I really liked her understanding the patient condition. From that onwards I'm revisiting for few health issues and i recovered with her suggestions and medications too.. Recently i went for 2nd delivery it is also safest during this covid times. I really blessed to get very kind,patient doctor for 2 pregnancies.

tags: None
review: We had been consulting her since the fetus of our first child was found to be dead inside within first 2 months. Later we have got successful delivery of our daughter who is 1.5 years ow. She was nice, patient and clear all through the journey. Recently we went to another doctor nearby (inside Vital Diagnostics ) to  for abortion of unplanned pregnency and could see huge difference between the professionalism of Bharati mam and the other doctor there. We are still repenting for the decision for not going to our regular doctor in this case.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi all my name is janani, it was my first preganancy, I had alot of doubts since it was my first preganancy. Bharathi doctor is very friendly in my first appointment itself.. She is very strict if u doest follow her medications and advice. She gives alot of advice. I got admitted in Oct 29th morning due to water break, I spent the hole day in hospital with pain, 29th mid night they induced labour pain, bharathi doc came in the mid night 2 am and did the delivery. This is the best thing I had not expected from doctors. Bharathi doc did it. Yes 
At the time of delivery, I suffered much, she was like angel standing in front of me helping me to deliver with lots of hope... Alot of thanks to her nd her family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Nine months of my pregnancy could have been a nightmare without your medical supervision. Thanks for making my journey to become a mommy nothing less than a dream come true for my first baby. Actual recovery may be in the hands of God but making a patient believe in recovery lies only in the hands of awesome doctors like you. Thanks for helping me doctor during my second delivery. Surgeons like you are not just doctors, but real life-savers. I may not have talked to God in my prayers, but in your services I have seen some of His favors. Thanks.Thank you for your excellent work while performing surgery on me. **** ***** *** ******* ** ** ******** ** **** ***** *** my pain has been minimal during recovery. Thank you for being a wonderful doctor. U r excellent, superb, amazing, kindful, lovel* *** **** ****** ** *** *********** ****** love u loads doctor.... Also I love ur way of dressing up....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I owe my Son's life to Dr Bharathi.
I had been consulting a Doctor at Cloudnine Jayanagar who suddenly told me to induce labour 7 days before the due date.
I went to Dr Bharathi for a second opinion. She advised me to wait till due term, and it was very good advice. My son gained 500 gms in the last week of my pregnancy.
She came on Sankranti day at wee hours in the morning inspite of being on leave for consultation that day and she and her team helped me deliver my son.
She gives good advice, explains situations in a very lucid manner and gives time to every patient. 
I would recommend Dr Bharathi for all gynae and pregnancy consultations

tags: None
review:
Excellent and very friendly doctor. 

I visited her for PCOs and harmonal imbalance, due to which there was complications in conceiving.I have been visiting her from past 5years. She listens to her patients calmly and explains them the treatment plan clearly. 

Finally her treatment showered loads of happiness in my life. Nobody else would have supported me so well throughout my pregnancy. She was there for me anytime during 9months of crucial journey. I still remember the day when I was rushed to delivery due to some complications and Bharathi Mam saved my child. Nobody else would have  taken show so much of interest and personal care as she did that day. She is a gods gift to many such patients like me.

With her guidance and support now I am a happy mother of two kids. My journey of being a mother is a dream come true because of Bharathi Mam’s treatment.

Our family is very thankful for Bharathi Mam’s timely support and treatment. Thanks Bharathi Mam for bringing loads of happiness in my life.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Bharthi ma’am has explained each and every problem related to conceive a child and the reason behind failure and also mentioned the procedure of the treatment very carefully ,she has answered my each queries patiently  which no doctor has done or bothered to tell me til date . She is Very friendly and after a long disappointed journey I see a ray of hope ,I am really happy that I met Bharthi ma’am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I reached Bharathi Rajanna for second pregnancy after having very difficult normal delivery first time and prolonged recovery. I wanted to have normal delivery this time around as well with no further complications.
I had a fantastic experience this time and she is precise in her approach , friendly and explanatory. She taught me diet plan/exercises to tackle delivery and delivery was very smooth and I was on my feet the very next day. I have recommended her to all my friends n relatives. I will be very happy to reach her again if I need may.
Very THANKFUL to the doctor if she gets to read this!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I never write online reviews. But this one I feel is my responsibility to help others reach and benefit from this wonderful doctor. I consulted her after conceiving in my first trimester. 
The journey was a smooth sail and wonderful experience until the day she handed me over my daughter in the operation theater. 
My family and I had to never worry about anything because of her due care. Inspite of being a very busy doctor she will always address your queries including the most silliest ones with utmost importance. She really knows what new parents go through during the unknown phases of pregnancy and becomes your strength with sound medical judgement and advice. 

A thorough professional, very experienced and responsible gynaecologist that every women deserves.

explanation given by doc about the length report is quite simple and more clear.
would recommend for some one who would need a gyno advice.

unfortunately we never been recognised based on the registration through Practo. (online appointment).

review: Hello, Dr. Bharathi is a very good doctor. I went to her to take some suggestions so that we can start our family planning. She explained us everything very nicely and calmly. She spend an hour with us and assured that we will get our baby.

tags: None
review: *** ** * ********* ****** *** a great human being.  She is calm and understanding doctor.  She has answered my calls and at times called me back during medical emergency to know my condition.  She gives lot of attention to her patients.  Her quick action during my delivery saved my son's life as I had some complications.******** * ********* ****  I would certainly recommend her to my family and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I wasn't sure which doctor to consult as this was the first time I was consulting any gynaec and I luckily happened to come across Dr.Bharathi's profile and decided to go ahead as she came to a hospital near my office and her profile seemed impressive and I couldnt have been happier that I consulted her. Her approach and treatment is so professional and friendly at the same time. I was so happy knowing that I now know a gynaec I can rely on for any issue without worrying if I am in safe hands.

tags: None

I will always be thankful to her n  god  .
